aliases: Dinah Laurel Lance Queen; Dinah Laurel Lance-Windrow

work.occupation: Detective/Crime-fighter, Chairperson of the Justice League of America; former florist, judo instructor
work.base: Formerly Oracle's clock tower in Gotham City; formerly Seattle, Washington; formerly Star City, California; formerly New York City, New York (as a member of the JSA); currently mobile

connections.groupAffiliation: Birds of Prey; formerly Justice League of America, Justice Society of America, Justice League Task Force, Justice League International, Team Arrow
connections.relatives: Larry Lance (father, deceased), Dinah Drake Lance (Black Canary, mother, deceased); Oliver Queen (Green Arrow, husband); Craig Windrow (ex-husband); Sin (adoptive daughter)
